page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: Our block,which we are covering consists of farm land,a Village,three Hamlets, the River Kit which eventually flows into the River Axe and Woodland.The area of our blocks covers a total of 12 square kms.From the top of the church tower we can see most of the block we are covering for the project e.g. farms, woodland, buildings and footpaths.The contryside consists of a series of hills and valleys.There is one main road into the village from the Chard Axminster trunk road known as the Fosse Way.The older buildings are predominately constructed of stone with a number of thatched roofs.There are mordern Council houses and some light industry units.Although there are many retired residents there is a lively young population which needs to be encouraged to remain.
